title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key is unresponsive.
EB: The tab key should navigate between elements in the Help view.
SR: To reproduce, launch the Help view and try using the tab key to navigate between elements.
